viralPosts.text:
I like this. People with disabilities are able to do many things, especially when we create environments for everyone. Disabled doesn't necessarily mean unhealthy. And many people are strong and fit. I'm going to stop using able-bodied and just use non-disabled. 

#WordsMatter #DisabilityJustice
viralPosts.author: drtaragoddard.com

viralPosts.text:
Vaguely-friendly reminder that when I complain about a game lacking accessibility settings, it's not because I'm a whiny little bitch who needs everything to be easy...

It's cuz I'm literally fucking disabled.

üßµ(1/4)

#disabled #gamer #vtuberswithdisabilities #disability #accessibility #indiegame

viralPosts.author: stevefaulkner.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
For as silly as I think it is, I think we should support people embracing accessibility technologies for the sake of AI agents by pointing them to the correct resources rather than pushing them away wholesale.

This is a chance to make a more accessible web, even if motivations are misguided.

#A11y

viralPosts.text:
He didn‚Äôt hurt anyone‚Äîhe just loved trains.
Darius McCollum, an autistic man, spent decades in jail for following his passion instead of being offered support or a job. The system punished difference instead of understanding it.
#AutismAwareness #DisabilityJustice #Inclusion #Pink #Momsky

viralPosts.text: Upturn savagely unmasks Medicaid's algorithmic gatekeepers as cynical ploys to starve disabled folks of home care, dialing eligibility via vendor whispers to slash costs over needs‚Äîtime for rebel coders to hijack these sham equations. #DisabilityJustice

viralPosts.text: Huge thankyou to CILIP Disability Network for awarding NLISN this Accessibility Award, which has now safely arrived in the post! We won as an organisation so although Jo and Andy are named, this award is for all of us. The committee, the network and all our allies. #cilip #libraries #accessibility
viralPosts.author: nlisn.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Train drivers getting the wheelchair ramp out are always delightful and thoughtful. 

Every time. 

I think we all enjoy being  useful, doing things that genuinely help others, it‚Äôs one of the better things about humans.

Trains that meet the platform evenly would still be better. 

#accessibility

viralPosts.text:
So part of my job is making lists of accessibility tools to help students find what works for their needs. This week, it's screen readers for visually impaired folks. I don't use one, so I'm looking for suggestions/recs/warnings/etc.

Which screen reader do you love (or loathe)? #Accessibility

viralPosts.author: byrneout44.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Many seem to think #disabled people "should just work", but they don't understand/care that:

1. Workplaces systemically discriminate against us 

2. We're often paid less than the non-disabled

3. Accommodations that would enable us to work are often denied

and it makes me mad.
#DisabilityJustice
